info.author: Dave Hunt
info.description:
# b2gpopulate

b2gpopulate is a tool to populate a
[Firefox OS](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Mozilla/Firefox_OS)
device with content.

## Requirements

Your device must be running a build of Firefox OS with
[Marionette](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Marionette) enabled.

## Installation

Installation is simple:

    pip install b2gpopulate

If you anticipate modifying b2gpopulate, you can instead:

    git clone git://github.com/mozilla/b2gpopulate.git
    cd b2gpopulate
    python setup.py develop

## Running

For full usage details run `b2gpopulate --help`.

info.html_description:
# b2gpopulate

b2gpopulate is a tool to populate a [Firefox OS](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Mozilla/Firefox_OS) device with content.

## Requirements

Your device must be running a build of Firefox OS with [Marionette](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Marionette) enabled.

## Installation

Installation is simple:

pip install b2gpopulate

If you anticipate modifying b2gpopulate, you can instead:

git clone git://github.com/mozilla/b2gpopulate.git cd b2gpopulate python setup.py develop

## Running

For full usage details run b2gpopulate –help.
